abstract: The Australasian brewer Lion Nathan said Monday it had abandoned its 7.3 billion Australian dollar ($4.9 billion) bid for Coca-Cola Amatil, after talks between major shareholders of the two companies broke down.
lead_paragraph: The Australasian brewer Lion Nathan said Monday it had abandoned its 7.3 billion Australian dollar ($4.9 billion) bid for Coca-Cola Amatil, after talks between major shareholders of the two companies broke down.

headline.main: Lion Nathan Cans $4.9 Billion Bid for Coca-Cola Amatil
